title: Favorite skin for your Main!
body:
What's your favorite skin that your main has?
If you have multiple mains/favorites,  you can post them all.

Mine: 

https://cdnb3.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/001/283/535/large/kelly-aleshire-brand-splash-5.jpg?1443593533

EDIT: I have multiple mains, so here are my other favorites:

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/1/11/Jarvan_IV_DragonslayerSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160328194747

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IwZrenZLrVs/VwQDDnfuRxI/AAAAAAAA5es/eKgmtZ25hpcV64NVVUXjKVV6oXewxgCKA/s640/Taric_Splash_3.jpg

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Lwe_0plVzGI/maxresdefault.jpg

replies.body:
Illaoi - I refuse to acknowledge the existence of her hideous skin.
Taliyah - Freljord is beautiful.
Jhin - High Noon is better in all aspects other than the music on the ultimate (the Southern twangy music on his skin is horrible)
Kindred - Shadowfire
Singed - Surfer
I take it you dislike Voidbringer Illaoi?
The purple looks ugly and the VO-FX they tried to do just sounds disgusting.
Well the void ain't pretty. ;)

http://i.imgur.com/CwBoIn1.jpg

Say that to her face.

The void ain't pretty.




Its beautiful.

>southern twangy music

it's old west guitars / harmonicas you swine

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ereUGPjHB-I/V7ZJKfYDO1I/AAAAAAAA9so/pJCfYWvZypsurKVJnKRdbhA_OeRRu07PQCLcB/s1600/Sion_Splash_2.jpg

Barbarians in RPGs hold a special place in my heart. For their own inner passion and self determination are what keeps them from fusing with the social experiment that is "civilization". They follow their own path, perfectly willing to die instead of becoming something they are not. 

That and the ability to be empowered by your rage has always appealed to me because I'm always afraid of hurting people I care about in my anger. 

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5_bW8R1zrlI/V-BRtSdQ3eI/AAAAAAAAUoA/uD-vV7r9b2EBbikzJs55ZwupiNgKd29vwCEw/s1600/Poppy_1920x1080.jpg

**SO KAWAII**

Now that's what I'm talking about. So much detail and well said. I can see the writer in you. :)

The Sion one was nice too. :P
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/facebook/000/010/809/happy-oh-stop-it-you.jpg

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/WOJ5K3pkPN0/maxresdefault.jpg

Seems the Gambler cheated his way out of Hell.
Urf the Nami-tee! :D
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DQj-hLNu5Tk/VmCpegsxf0I/AAAAAAAA1rI/PLLU2kvAq2A/s1920/dragontrainertristanafinal_1920.jpg best skin for her hands down. All trist mains should own this.{{champion:18}}
The VO lines on that skin are gold, and I don't even play her.

"The fire means he likes you!"
"Stop pouting, we'll eat later"
"Reggie! Speak! *blows fire in her face* close enough...." 

I abosoluly love the VO.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/hoMBVHCKloY/maxresdefault.jpg

This will forever be my favorite skin and is a perfect fit for Janna's concept. Despite the hate for it, its so wacky and fun to use in game.

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-R4nXnGyjhXo/V47ARiPFdqI/AAAAAAAA81A/DAZqqQkOACQ_n6MtwVf-kqBUgq1_phdlACLcB/s1600/Lux_Splash_2.jpg

I have yet to really see a great skin for Lux, not a fan of star guardian, but the updated splash sold me on this one.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/3jr7bVUWhaQ/maxresdefault.jpg

Another one that was bashed on when released because of the in game model, but Morgana's model is just bad in general. The q animation and sound effect are really cool though which is why this one is my favorite.

Arclight {{champion:161}}.

_"Knowledge through disentegration"_

Nothing has yet to top Battlecast Vel'Koz.
Arclight is only for when I need to show Lux who the true light mage is.
Definitely Not Vel'Koz is for when I don't feel like playing Vel'Koz.
The Glorious Evolution cannot be stopped.

> [{quoted}](name=Wheatloaf,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EJ90kAvP,comment-id=00070001,timestamp=2016-10-04T12:11:44.331+0000)
>
> Nothing has yet to top Battlecast Vel'Koz.

 _Cough Battlecast Alpha Skarner Cough_
> Arclight is only for when I need to show Lux who the true light mage is.

It's also great against Varus and Vayne. Or any champ, come to think of it. 
> Definitely Not Vel'Koz is for when I don't feel like playing Vel'Koz.

I never feel like not playing Vel'koz
> The Glorious Evolution cannot be stopped.

Go play Viktor then.

> Cough Battlecast Alpha Skarner Cough

I shouldn't have to clarify that I was referring to Vel'Koz skins; I do own Battlecast Alpha Skarner, and it is a fantastic skin.

> It's also great against Varus and Vayne. Or any champ, come to think of it.

But why would you use Arclight against other champions when there's a clearly better skin available?

> I never feel like not playing Vel'koz

But a handsome, tentacled man in a pinstripe suit is so alluring...

> Go play Viktor then.

The Creator is indeed in my champion pool.

On a completely unrelated note, do you think there's any chance of Vel'Koz mains that prefer Battlecast ever getting along with the heathens that prefer Arclight?

> [{quoted}](name=Wheatloaf,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EJ90kAvP,comment-id=0007000100000000,timestamp=2016-10-04T18:35:03.006+0000)


> But why would you use Arclight against other champions when there's a clearly better skin available?
 
Because that's the best Vel'koz skin. No debate is possible about this issue.
> 
> But a handsome, tentacled man in a pinstripe suit is so alluring...

Maybe, but I shouldn't have to clarify that I was referrring to Vel'koz skins. 
> 
> The Creator is indeed in my champion pool.
 
Arclight Vel'koz bows to nobody, can you say the same of Battlecast?

> On a completely unrelated note, do you think there's any chance of Vel'Koz mains that prefer Battlecast ever getting along with the heathens that prefer Arclight?

On a completely unrelated note, do you think there's any chanve of Vel'koz mains that prefer Arclight ever getting along with the heathens that prefer Battlecast?
The best way to study for an exam. ;)
Burning your notes is the only way to really learn whats on them.

Don't get me wrong, I have PROJECT and Heartseeker and still love all those nifty skins a lot, but for some reason I find the vanilla-esque {{champion:22}}  skins (classic, Sherwood, and Freljord) to be the most aesthetically pleasing.
Simplicity is its own beauty sometimes. :)

https://i.imgur.com/mhBJha6.jpg

Is my absolute favorite skin right now. As a {{champion:89}} main, i've been waiting for a skin that had good quality textures to match the current game's graphics, showed her hair, did a great job to model her face, and was a theme outside of generic knight of some kind. Behold, Riot gave us the BBQ Leona skin and it's perfect. Love everything about it, and heck it was only 750 RP too. I haven't used any other Leona skin since, and using this skin, Leona got me into promos for Platinum. So yeah this is my favorite, of all time.
I'm getting into Leona myself, and that skin is gourgeous.

https://tse3.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.M73b6fb31909b17e22a158cce5988e004o0&w=275&h=162&c=7&rs=1&qlt=90&o=4&url=http%3a%2f%2fwww.surrenderat20.net%2f2015%2f10%2f106-pbe-update.html&pid=1.1
just cuz
I have project but I like this one better for some reason

{{champion:432}}  - Snowday Bard. Elderwood is nice though.

{{champion:35}}  - Nutcracko

I guess I like winter.

I like snowday Bard as well. Partly cause it's easier for someone who doesn't know Bard to read his Shrines (Marshmallow goes in the cup before you drink your hot cocoa) and partly cause of these:

 http://how2play.pl/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/bardpenguin.jpg?e96ac7

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/8/87/Wukong_GeneralSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160326011801
Actually Looks like a buffed up Monkey King, the armour is cool, and the face is not too ugly like with the other skins.
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/5/53/Miss_Fortune_CaptainSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160520014140
This should be her default skin, but non the less I love this one cause its lore relevant.
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/1/12/Viktor_CreatorSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160518205300
Love this one cause its also lore relevant, but AU relevant, plus the animation is nice.
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/1/15/Fiora_PROJECTSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160519203244
I like Pink VFX and I can not lie.
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d9/Soraka_CelestineSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160518201800
Orthodox Matriarch Soraka to the rescue! The Ultimate Healer skin.
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/cf/Veigar_VeigarGreybeardSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160405202620
You shall not pass! Its freaking Gandalf skin, need I say more.

I say the SAME THING about Captain Miss Fortune! It's so underrated, and my favorite by far. Arcade is nice but Captain is so much more dignified than her scrappy bullshit default skin. And definitely makes more sense in her lore.

When I play Veigar, I play Veigar Greybeard.
When I play Ryze, I play Ryze Whitebeard.

{{champion:107}} this one is fan made and I use a mod. http://i.imgur.com/SYlPUa7.jpg
{{champion:58}} my favourite lane bully. http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/September_2013/PPNA/rppspl.jpg
{{champion:75}} my favourite late game top laner. http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/infn-articlebanner.jpg?itok=_ukO-DCx
{{champion:82}} I actually prefer playing him as adcs and jungle. https://i.ytimg.com/vi/srQExUjqfYw/maxresdefault.jpg
{{champion:104}} Mafia Graves boi
I'll give you three hints, but you won't need a single one.

Badger Teemo

/s
Superb Villain Veigar?
Classic {{champion:113}}.

Super Galaxy Fizz, because that amazing ult animation feels so good to use
Fnatic Gragas because who doesn't love throwing a beer filled championship cup around
Project Ekko because how smooth the skin feels to use
Officer Vi because of the sirens when you ult someone
I main Shen as either blood moon or warlord.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/KpJoseFlnC8/maxresdefault.jpg
https://cdn1.twinfinite.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/janna-438x350.jpg
http://m.imgur.com/gallery/QVdgoUs?noredirect

Guardian of the Sands Xerath
Snowday Syndra
Firefox Ahri
Blade Queen Lissandra
Bladecraft Orianna
Archlight Vel'Koz
Cosmic Reaver Kassadin

I like other skins of them too though. Those ones slightly win (except Kassadin)

http://art-of-lol.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/Justicar-Aatrox.jpg
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/f/f7/Aatrox_Justicar_Screenshots.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20131213164501

I love this skin so much
All 4 of Lulu's 1350 skins  =P

Super Galaxy Kindred
SSW Twitch
PROJECT Fiora
Cosmic Reaver Kassadin

> [{quoted}](name=PhantomAxolotl,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EJ90kAvP,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-10-03T20:16:28.176+0000)
>
> Super Galaxy Kindred
> SSW Twitch
> PROJECT Fiora
> Cosmic Reaver Kassadin

I gotta say though SSW Twitch is slick af. I love that shit, he looks so clean. I've been admiring that the whole time they've been up for worlds ahahaha
